price: 42. Dan Kami ciptakan (juga) untuk mereka (angkutan lain) seperti apa yang mereka kendarai.*(722)
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ
footnotes: *722). Hewan-hewan tunggangan dan alat-alat pengangkutan umumnya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
